thread.title: Britain's Smart Cities venue

author: The Telegraph
title: Britain's Smart Cities venue
text: Find out more about Britain's Smart Cities » Andaz London Liverpool Street is one of the city of London’s most prominent conference and meeting venues. It offers a superb location in the heart of the city with excellent transport links to the city’s main airports. The hotel is located next to Liverpool Street Station, served by the Central, Circle and District underground lines and a number of train companies. A preferential bedroom rate has been offered from Andaz London Liverpool Street for attendees on a first-come first-served basis. Please call reservations on 020 7618 5010 or email reservations.londonliv@andaz.com quoting G-TELH as a group booking reference code to reserve accommodation. Venue address: Andaz 40 Liverpool Street London England EC2M 7QN
